title: post api auth login user login with valid credentials
description: Test the user login endpoint with valid username and password to ensure successful authentication and JWT token issuance.

title: post api auth logout user logout with valid token
description: Test the user logout endpoint with a valid JWT token to verify successful session termination and token invalidation.

title: post api vehicles entry register vehicle entry
description: Test the vehicle entry registration endpoint to ensure a vehicle can be successfully registered as entering the parking lot.

title: post api vehicles exit register vehicle exit and calculate fees
description: Test the vehicle exit registration endpoint to verify correct vehicle exit processing and accurate fee calculation.

title: get api vehicles parked get list of currently parked vehicles
description: Test the endpoint to retrieve the list of currently parked vehicles, ensuring accurate and up-to-date data is returned.

title: get api vehicles capacity get parking capacity status
description: Test the parking capacity status endpoint to verify it returns correct information about current parking availability and capacity.

title: get api vehicles history get complete vehicle history
description: Test the vehicle history endpoint to ensure it returns a complete and accurate record of all vehicle entries and exits.

title: get api reports daily get daily report
description: Test the daily report generation endpoint to verify it returns accurate and timely parking usage and income data for the day.

title: get api users get all users
description: Test the endpoint to retrieve all users, ensuring it returns complete user data with correct role assignments.

title: post api users create new user
description: Test the user creation endpoint to verify new users can be created with valid data and assigned appropriate roles.
